title: Magnificent 4 BR two story townhome near Aliante.
map_address: 549 Coastal Dreams Ave. near Centennial Pkwy and Revere
posting_body: Magnificent 4 bed/2.5 bath two story townhome near Aliante!
Large front living room with a fireplace and a ceiling fan!
Kitchen has an island with a breakfast bar.
Master bedroom has a walk-in closet.
Master bath has double sinks and a separate tub and shower!
Has a backyard area with a patio!
Only one half a wall shared with a neighbor!
For more information on this property or to set up an appointment to view it, please call Chris at
Please reference the street name 549 COASTAL DREAMS AVE.
Located at Centennial Pkwy and Revere.
